TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_ahecid, title = ahecid, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/ahecid} }

S.FORM: == satangahan == u zuma a kamu u kamu nu Hulam:鹹 u kamu nu Amilika:salty u kamu nu Zipun:塩辛い tinaku a kamu ahecid 鹹 ahecid ku nisalami' niza tatayna. 那女人煮的菜很鹹. ahcid 很鹹 tinacen ku kabi mitaneng tu ahcid! 用舔的嚐湯的鹹度！ aheciday 鹹的 aheciday ku heci nu lebus. 鹽膚木的果實是鹹的. aheciden 覺得很鹹 aheciden kaku tu silaw. 我覺得醃肉很鹹. saaheciday 最鹹的 saaheciday ku silaw ni Sayun. Sayun 的醃肉是最鹹的. siahecid 有鹹味 siahecid ku heci nu lebus. 鹽膚木的果實有鹹味.

== satangahan == o zoma a kamo o kamo no Holam:鹹 o kamo no Amilika:salty o kamo no Zipon:塩辛い tinako a kamo ahecid 鹹 ahecid ko nisalami' niza tatayna. 那女人煮的菜很鹹. ahcid 很鹹 tinacen ko kabi mitaneng to ahcid! 用舔的嚐湯的鹹度！ aheciday 鹹的 aheciday ko heci no lebos. 鹽膚木的果實是鹹的. aheciden 覺得很鹹 aheciden kako to silaw. 我覺得醃肉很鹹. saaheciday 最鹹的 saaheciday ko silaw ni Sayon. Sayon 的醃肉是最鹹的. siahecid 有鹹味 siahecid ko heci no lebos. 鹽膚木的果實有鹹味.
